item.title: Erin add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Don't be ridiculous, Charlie, people love the parents who beat their kids in department stores. It's the ones who just let their kids wreak havoc that everybody hates." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Erin add a quote by Christopher Moore
Erin add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Not unlike the toaster, I control darkness." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Erin add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "The hip-hop guy nodded curtly, like he knew that, and despite appearances to the contrary, he had not been trippin', but had, in fact, been chillin' like a mo-fuckin' villain, so step the fuck off, wigga. He crossed against the light, limping slightly under the weight of the subtext." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Erin add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "No one knows why, but second only to eating the brains of the living, the dead love affordable prefab furniture." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Erin add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "They want to be tied up, I tie them up. They want to be spanked, I spank them. They want to be called names, I call them names. But try and drink a little of their blood, and they scream like babies. What about my needs?" -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Erin add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "You bitch! You killed me! You suck!" -- Christopher Moore
